text: Bouin-Plumoison is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de- France region in northern France. ==Geography== A small village situated some 2 miles (3 km) west of Hesdin on the D149 road. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Bouin-Plumoison
